trends: There have been no other sightings in Fayetteville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Glowing sphere no sound. An airplane went towards object then went around object then turned west had sound one blinking light
divs: sighting detailson june 3rd around 22:45 - 23:00 hours while standing outside in driveway with fried, we noticed a relatively slow moving yellowish sphere moving silently through sky. we were intrigued that it was silent and had no commercial\collision lights. object was traveling on a northern heading then turned east. at the same time, a what seemed to be a commercial aircraft flying west to east, went towards object at approximately same altitude, went around object and returned on a westerly heading. had normal jet sound but only a port side blinking light, object never altered course and never made a sound though object did "dim" then went back to original luminosity realatively clear evening, stars quite visible. minimal light pollution. no rain or fog. approx. 55 degrees
